website_summaries.verdict: An affordable supplement that contains at least 400 mg per serving of plant sterols and stanols.
pros: Made with Reducol, a blend of plant sterols and stanols that helps lower LDL cholesterol
Contains no dyes, artificial flavors, or preservatives
cons: To achieve the best-possible results, supplement must be taken at least two times daily with meals

customer_reviews.title: My physician recommended statins due to the fact that I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the results. My physician recommended statins due to the fact that I have had borderline high cholesterol levels for more than 20 years. I decided to watch my diet a bit more closely, walk every day, and add CholestOff. My overall cholesterol has dropped from 216 to 163 in a matter of months. Better yet, my LDL is down to 69 and my HDL is at 73, giving me a good ratio. I rarely write reviews, but the truth is, this can be a gift to those of us hoping to avoid statins.
customer_reviews.author: DJG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Been on statins for 15 years for genetically high cholesterol, and on meds my total cholesterol plateaus out at 211, and LDL is always still too high. Started taking Cholestoff three weeks before my last labs, and my doctor and I were both stunned that my cholesterol dropped 34 points...all from the LDL. Was skeptical at first, but I'm a believer now. Already purchased three more boxes, and one for a gift. Very excited to see what my numbers are at my appointment in six months.
customer_reviews.author: Sunberry

customer_reviews.title: Surprizingly  low cholesterol  after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: Well I am convinced. I started taking these about two months ago. My total cholesterol has always been high. That is partly due to my HDL always being well above 70. My LDL has been high as well, usually around 180. I am 60 years old, don’t exercise and basically eat whatever I want. When I seen to see my doctor last week my total cholesterol was less than 200! It has never been that low in my life. My HDL was still hanging in there at 70 so my LDL was 120! Wow, I may live longer now. Guess I better start exercising now.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Elder

customer_reviews.title: Still a bit high and I'm continuing cholestoff but that's a nice improvement in my opinion with no prescription drugs
customer_reviews.text: My cholesterol was 225 in mid February 2018, I did change my diet some and took cholestoff once a day (I didn't take it twice as I honestly just didn't read the directions thoroughly). As of May 15, 2018 my cholesterol is at 202... Still a bit high and I'm continuing cholestoff but that's a nice improvement in my opinion with no prescription drugs. I will update in three months at my next doctors visit.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Better off to buy the "PLUS" formula vs this original one
customer_reviews.text: This is not the "PLUS" caplette that Costco sells. Although the price per pill is low for the Original, vs other retailers, it's worth paying for the benefits of the PLUS formula. Regardless in terms of does this product do what it's suppose to?, this product works. I had rising Cholesterol in a blood test, and immediately went on CholestOff PLUS. 4 weeks later, my blood test came back awesome. I believe in this product, and numbers don't lie.
customer_reviews.author: VDAWG&Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: Cholesterol from 242 to 158😁
customer_reviews.text: I added these pills to my routine because my cholesterol was 242. I don't exercise but I stopped eating regular eggs and only ate egg whites. Also I stopped eating bacon everyday. 7 months later my cholesterol level is 158. I cant say for certain how much this helped but it sure didn't hurt! So along with this and definite diet changes will help. Also I changed my butter to the zero cholesterol butter, think it's called smart balance.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Significantly lowered cholesterol!
customer_reviews.text: I have genetically inherited high cholesterol. Even in my 30’s with a healthy diet and weight, my cholesterol was in the 200’s. I started taking this product very sporadically along with Kyolic garlic after my Dr. mentioned the dreaded statin medication. Just got my recent blood panel back and my cholesterol went from 224 to 167! My trygicerides went from 130 to 98. I really couldn’t be more surprised and pleased. I’ll work to be more consistent taking this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aratay

customer_reviews.title: No doubt about this product IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cholesterol test back yesterday. I have been taking this for 5 months just 1 everyday it recommends 4 but I don't like the leg cramps most statins will give you but with 1 pill for 5 months all my cholesterol is down my Triglycerides went from 292 to 275 still high but I haven't been able to exercise if so it would probably be lower. My total cholesterol went from 276 tp 243.. I recommend these hands down. Don't pay more than 12$ for 120 though there are a lot of seller that charge way too much for these. I paid $11.40.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: My cholesterol was border line and once started taking them, my cholesterol has improved drastically. Make sure you are eating healthy and still watching what you eat; especially trans and saturated fats. I have been taking them for 2 years. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recommended plant sterols to be added to my statin
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended plant sterols to be added to my statin, as my cholesterol was not going down enough. This knocked 50 points off my total! I'm obviously very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Blood Test Proved This Worked for Me
customer_reviews.text: I had used Red Yeast Rice off and on for several years, each time stopping it due to muscle weakness. Before giving up entirely, I decided to try a plant based product. Although the packaging recommended 4 tablets per day, I decided to start with 2 per day. After 5 months on the product, my total cholesterol dropped 50 points. I am definitely sticking with this product, and out of curiosity have upped my dose to 3 tablets per day. This may not work for all, but I highly recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Bad breath warning.
customer_reviews.text: We where looking forward to seeing the results of this product.Unfortunally my husband breath started to change 5 days after starting taking this supplement and not for good .It took another 5 to 7 days to get back to normal if you can have someone checking your breath it will be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Found product to have side effects....
customer_reviews.text: Found out that ingredients are from the pine tree family....may work, but unfortunately my wife has an allergy to Pine.
customer_reviews.author: carl mahan

customer_reviews.title: Helped Lower my Cholesterol
customer_reviews.text: Took this for 1 month along with eating fairly good and some other vitamins. My cholesterol went from 232 down to 208. I believe this helped. Will continue to take and do another check soon.
customer_reviews.author: stonegyrl

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I took 4 a day for 6 months with no change in my cholesterol. I did have a change in my metabolism though. I gained weight because I think it may have been blocking my Thyroid NP from being absorbed. I had my Lipid panel done and saw no change at all. I wouldn't waste my money on it if you are considering trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This product I totally like Cholestoff 4 capsules and Sports Research omega 3 fish oil and 2 capsules on a daily dose. Helped so much I really recommend these two together! My triglycerides in Aug 2019 started at 1267 which was extremely super high. And I started to take these two items together in November 2019. On January 14, 2020 my Dr's office called me to let ne know of my results new blood work. To my surprise WOW!!! my triglycerides are down to 417 which is a significant amount of difference. Even though it's still a little high I'm still taking both items. And will be taking statins in the next two weeks. I'm so happy 😊 !
customer_reviews.author: ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I was using this product for four months. I took the 4 recommended daily pills divided into two doses. After 4 months the total cholesterol dropped only 9 points, but what is worse, the LDL went up, the HDL went down and the triglycerides also went up to values ​​that I had never had in my life. I do not recommend it, bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Lucero

customer_reviews.title: 7 points in a month
customer_reviews.text: Down 7 points in one month. Grant it, I was 201, so no as high as some people, but still. 7 points in a month with little dieting and NO exercise - that's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: AAJ77

customer_reviews.title: Took this for 2 months, went to Dr and my Cholesterol went UP.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Kinda hard to swallow, but I have that problem when pills are not gelcaps. I but all Nature Made Vitamins and am disappointed. Have to go back on Dr's Statin RX. Cholestrol went way up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement in addition to meds if Cholesterol is high
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended these for high cholesterol and it worked! I do take a cholesterol med, but my doctor took me off the high dose med and on a low dose one a year after using these. Am so glad to have them handy. I take them regularly, but especially when I am eating fries or something high in oil/ fat. I feel much better now, and am glad to have these handy in addition to meds. Ask your doctor about these caplets, they might help bring your 'bad' numbers down!
customer_reviews.author: B3loyalist

customer_reviews.title: These worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: After just a few months of using Cholestoff twice a day my cholesterol went from 286 to 250 after watching it continuously raising the past few years.. I will be continuing its use and expecting further good results. My doctor recommended this when i refused statins. She said she has several patients who have had positive results as well!
customer_reviews.author: J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Husband swears by these. High cholesterol runs in his family and all of his siblings are on medication but his is under control without medication. He attributes it to this product, oatmeal, exercise and diet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Schiavone

customer_reviews.title: This worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this products for 3 years. The first year I had over 56 points off my 260 cholestrol . I have been maintaining this loss for the last 2 years. Checked with a dietician before taking this and she assured me it would not interfere with any vitamin absorption or medicine.
customer_reviews.author: golf librarian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bad cholesterol went from 210 to 184, exercise everyday and added fiber and more water. Only took 90 days!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cha

customer_reviews.title: NOT CAPSULES
customer_reviews.text: Hard pills rarely breakdown and are VERY difficult for me to digest. They call these "Caplets" but they are by no means even close to being capsules or gelcaps like the CholestOff I have ordered in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Ann Moyer

customer_reviews.title: worked!
customer_reviews.text: This product, along with fish oil, has improved my cholesterol levels over the last 5 months. They are thic tablets, but easier to swallow than fish oil gel caps.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Tutt

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from taking Statins
customer_reviews.text: In December 2015 my LDL was 171 and total cholesterol was 251. In January 2016, I started taking 2 of these in the morning with 1x450mg Pantethine and then the same combo in the evening. My readings in April were LDL 107 and total C 194. I did exercise more and eat better during the period but my LDL number has never been that low. Doctor was ready to put me on meds but not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more worries with CholestOff
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this supplement for a few months and I have also stayed off of foods that not good for me. I feel better and waiting for my blood results now, but I am sure CholestOff is doing it's job.

customer_reviews.title: Got a great result lowering my cholesterol when talking these pills
customer_reviews.text: I have had high cholesterol for several years. While I did make some dietary and exercise changes, they were not extreme, but my blood work after taking these for about 6 months was excellent.

customer_reviews.title: Have Me Cramps Like a Statin!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good choice for me. After several days, I got cramps in my legs, hands and arms. If felt like I had taken a statin! What a waste of my money. Never again.

customer_reviews.title: Improved my Cholesterol

I was right on the border line - my LDL cholesterol was 5 mg/dL too high last year. I started used CholestOff taking two tablets a day for about six months and my LDL cholesterol dropped 10 mg/dL.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and avoid statins!
customer_reviews.text: This dropped my total points by 50! The nurse at my cardiologist couldn't believe I did this. My cardiologist was going to put me on a statin but I dropped it 50 points and he said even though it's not down enough to where he wants, he was ok with me not taking a statin. I hate taking prescription drugs. HATE IT! I've had two open heart surgery's and have negotiated off all pills that I possibly can by good eating habits and doing what it takes to get off of stuff. This Cholestoff has been a huge part of that road to success.

customer_reviews.title: It actually works

It's been such a relief to not have to go on statins and be able to take this easy supplement instead. I was skeptical but it really does work.

customer_reviews.text: I have been using CholestOff original for last 15 years it does a good job reducing my LDL at dietary level

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Healthy Idea for Most Anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I'm and active 31 male and I had higher cholesterol. Welcome to America. We all need to prepare as early as our 20's for this. I take one of these twice a day with meals and I take 2 if I'm eating something I know I shouldn't. I've bought 4 of these and my cholesterol has gone down but I've eaten healthier in that time and found sustainable exercising (rollerblading at a trail).
customer_reviews.author: M. HOLBROOK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for months and am very happy with results.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schubert

product_meta.title: Nature Made CholestOff Original Caplets, 120 Count for Heart Health (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
A healthy cholesterol level is an important part of heart health.‡ CholestOff Original is made with Reducol, a proprietary blend of plant sterols and stanols (also called phytosterols) that can help lower LDL (“bad”) cholesterol by reducing the absorption of dietary cholesterol into the bloodstream.‡ The National Institutes of Health (NIH) Therapeutic Lifestyle Change Guidelines recommends 2,000 mg of plant sterols and stanols as part of a therapeutic diet to help lower cholesterol. However, many Americans only consume 200 mg through their diet. CholestOff Original provides the additional 1,800 mg of plant sterols and stanols needed to help meet what the NCEP recommends for cholesterol reduction. Products containing at least 400 mg per serving of plant sterols and stanols, eaten twice a day with meals for a daily intake of at least 800 mg as part of a diet low in saturated fat and cholesterol.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. Both have the same great product inside. Based on new FDA regulations, you may also notice a change in the unit of measure and/or daily value for certain products.
Contains a 30-day supply of Nature Made CholestOff Original, 120 caplets per bottle.
With 900 mg plant sterols and stanols per serving for a daily intake of 1,800 mg. Adults, take 2 caplets twice daily with water at your two largest meals.
This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
